post:
EnvieWebs.com offers cheap KVM VPS' starting from £2.79/month with Free DDoS Protection in Roubaix, FR.  We are based in Manchester, UK and have a rapid, knowledgeable support team. All VPS come with Virtualizor so you can manage your virtual server.
  
> **KVM Mini**  
> 1GB RAM  
> 60GB HDD  
> 1x3.2Ghz Shared Core  
> 2TB Data Transfer  
> 1 IPv4  
> <del>£3.99/month</del> £2.79/month ($4.35)  
> Coupon Code: LOWENDTALK  
> Link: https://enviebilling.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=20  
  
> **KVM One**  
> 2GB RAM  
> 120GB HDD  
> 2x3.2Ghz Shared Core  
> 4TB Data Transfer  
> 1 IPv4  
> <del>£5.99/month</del> £4.19/month ($6.53)  
> Coupon Code: LOWENDTALK  
> Link: https://enviebilling.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=17  
  
Windows Server is BYOL (bring your own license). Custom ISOs can be added on request. Do not hesitate to contact us if you have any questions!  Coupon expires 27/12/2014.
  
Custom packages are available on request, please make a ticket if you require this.
